plot: The art of poetry and music resurrecting on a colonial city of Santo Domingo in the Dominican Republic, mysteriously brings love among two people in twenty-four hours.
title: Galaxia
plot_es: The art of poetry and music resurrecting on a colonial city of Santo Domingo in the Dominican Republic, mysteriously brings love among two people in twenty-four hours.
plot_en: The art of poetry and music resurrecting on a colonial city of Santo Domingo in the Dominican Republic, mysteriously brings love among two people in twenty-four hours.
